content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 22.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting the Offshore Pump to the Boiler and the Boiler to the Steam Engine
- Small Electric Poles at positions (-1.5, 20.5), (-6.5, 22.5), (-7.5, 22.5), and (-7.5, 21.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting entities with pipes
- Ensure that there are enough pipes in the inventory before attempting to connect entities.
- Verify the positions and connectivity of entities before attempting to connect them with pipes.

### Errors due to missing inventory items
- Always check the inventory for required items before attempting to place or connect entities.
- Harvest or craft necessary items if they are not available in the inventory.

### Errors when using undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before use. Double-check spelling and case sensitivity of variable names.

### Errors when entities are not powered
- Ensure that all entities requiring power are connected to the electric network using electric poles.
- Verify that the electric poles are connected properly and have a power source.

### Errors when entities have no fuel or ingredients
- Regularly check the status of entities like boilers and furnaces to ensure they have the necessary fuel or ingredients to operate.
